fields.name: Explain_if_No_Text_0
fields.fieldText:
You answered 'No' to question 4 (Functioning as designed post-repair). You must provide an explanation.

Click on the Previous button to go back and fill in the field 'Explain if No'.

fields.name: Missing_Location_Test
fields.fieldText:
You must select the Occurrence Location.

Click on the Previous button to go back.

fields.name: Missing_Q4_Text
fields.fieldText:
You must answer question 4 (Functioning as designed post-repair).

Click on the Previous button to go back and answer the question.

fields.name: Missing_Tests_txt
fields.fieldText:
Select which tests you have performed (Audible/Functional/Visual). You must select at least one option.

Click on the Previous button to go back.

fields.name: X1_Issue_covered_by_and_found_during_PM_or_BPI_PDI
fields.fieldText: 1) Issue covered by and found during PM or BPI/PDI?

validationRule.errorMessage: Input a date, or mark "No PM Sticker date"
